documentation.text:
@dev delegate deposit matic into contract to stake
 Emits a {Delegate} event.*

@dev lock migrating matic from contract to ethereum
 Emits a {Migrate} event*

@dev claim the rewards of user
 Emits a {Claim}*

@dev balanceOf get balance of account
 @param account who has delegated*
@dev totalSupply get supply of this contract*

@dev get the pcoin reward of account
 @param account who has delegated*

@dev InitOrder on initOrder()
 @param order the parameters of order*

attributes.text:
@dev delegate deposit matic into contract to stake
 Emits a {Delegate} event.*

@dev lock migrating matic from contract to ethereum
 Emits a {Migrate} event*

@dev claim the rewards of user
 Emits a {Claim}*

@dev balanceOf get balance of account
 @param account who has delegated*
@dev totalSupply get supply of this contract*

@dev get the pcoin reward of account
 @param account who has delegated*

@dev InitOrder on initOrder()
 @param order the parameters of order*

params.matic: the reward of matic for user
params.pcoin: the reward of pcoin for user*

params.amount: the reward of matic from ethereum*

claim().details: claim the rewards of user Emits a {Claim}*

delegate().details: delegate deposit matic into contract to stake Emits a {Delegate} event.*

params.orderParam: the initialization parameters of order Emits a {InitOrder} event.*

lock().details: lock migrating matic from contract to ethereum Emits a {Migrate} event*

reply(uint128).details: repay the rewards from ethereum to delegates

params.id: the index of order Emits a {reply}*

reward(address).details: get the pcoin reward of account

totalSupply().details: totalSupply get supply of this contract*

undelegate(uint256).details: undelegate withdraw matic from contract to unstake

params.amount: the withdraw amount of user Emits a {Undelegate} event.*
